item.title: Volvo VM Cavalo Mecanico v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 12, 2025

Volvo VM Cavalo Mecanico v1.0 ETS2

The Volvo VM “Cavalo Mecânico” is a very popular truck in Brazil, known for its versatility and robustness, especially for medium-duty hauling. In Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), you can bring this iconic Brazilian workhorse into your game through various mods.
“Cavalo Mecânico” literally translates to “Mechanical Horse,” which is the Portuguese term for a truck tractor or prime mover – essentially, the part of the truck that pulls a trailer, as opposed to a “caminhão rígido” (rigid truck) which has the cargo body permanently attached.

Key Features of Volvo VM Cavalo Mecânico Mods for ETS2
Mod creators, especially those from the Brazilian community, put a lot of effort into making the Volvo VM as realistic as possible for ETS2 players. Here’s what you can typically expect:
Detailed Model: Mods usually feature high-quality 3D models of the Volvo VM, covering both the exterior and a detailed interior, often including specific Brazilian regional accessories.
Chassis Options: You’ll commonly find various chassis configurations suitable for a “cavalo mecânico,” such as:
4×2: Standard two-axle configuration for lighter loads.
6×2: Three-axle, with one liftable axle, for increased load capacity and maneuverability.
6×4: Three-axle, with two driven axles, for heavy hauling and off-road capability.
Engine & Transmission Options: The mods typically offer a range of engine power options that reflect the real Volvo VM, which is usually found in horsepower ratings like 220 HP, 270 HP, 330 HP, and 360 HP. Corresponding transmission options (e.g., 12-speed) are also included.
Realistic Sounds (FMOD): Many high-quality VM mods incorporate FMOD sound technology to replicate the distinctive engine sounds, air brakes, and horn of the real Volvo VM, greatly enhancing the immersion.
Extensive Customization: This is often a major highlight. You can expect to customize:
Exterior Accessories: Various bumper options, grilles, lights (including LEDs and spotlights), mudguards, side skirts, antennas, and unique paint jobs or skin templates.
Interior Details: Different dashboard options (e.g., white or black panel), seat textures, curtains, radios, GPS, and other interior decorations.
Animations: Look for animated wipers, windows, and possibly other cabin elements.
Standalone Mod: Most Volvo VM Cavalo Mecânico mods are standalone, meaning they don’t replace any default trucks in the game. You’ll typically find them available for purchase at the Volvo dealership in ETS2, or sometimes at a custom “mod dealer.”
Compatibility: Modders regularly update their Volvo VM mods to ensure they work with the latest versions of ETS2 (e.g., 1.50, 1.51, 1.55). Always check the mod’s description for compatibility information.

Installation Steps (for .scs files):
Download: Get the `.scs` file (or multiple `.scs` files if it’s a multi-part mod) for the Volvo VM.
Locate Mod Folder: Navigate to your ETS2 mod folder. This is usually found in your “Documents” folder: `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
Copy Files: Copy the downloaded `.scs` file(s) into this `mod` folder.
Activate in Game:
Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the main menu, go to the Mod Manager.
Find the Volvo VM mod(s) in the list and activate them by moving them from the left column to the right column.
Set Priority: If there are multiple `.scs` files for the same mod (e.g., a base file, a sound pack, an accessory pack), ensure you set the correct loading order/priority as instructed by the mod creator. Generally, the main truck file goes higher, with sound and accessory packs below it.
Confirm your changes and load your game profile. You should then be able to purchase the Volvo VM at the Volvo dealership in-game.

The Volvo VM Cavalo Mecânico mod is perfect for ETS2 players who want to experience driving a popular Brazilian truck, adding more diversity and a touch of South American trucking culture to their game.

Credits: CLAUDIO GAMER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Projeto Grande Recife v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 12, 2025

Projeto Grande Recife v1.0 ETS2

The “Projeto Grande Recife” is an exciting map mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) that aims to recreate the urban bus lines and environment of the Greater Recife Metropolitan Region in Pernambuco, Brazil. This project stands out because it focuses specifically on urban bus simulation, which is a unique and sought-after experience within ETS2, especially for those who enjoy the “Bus Driver Simulator” aspect of the game.

Key Features of the Projeto Grande Recife Mod
Focus on Urban Bus Routes: Unlike many Brazilian map mods that focus on long-haul truck routes, Projeto Grande Recife is designed for shorter, intricate urban bus lines, reflecting the daily operations of public transport in a major Brazilian city.
Detailed Recreation: The mod attempts to accurately reproduce the neighborhoods, streets, and urban landscapes of the Greater Recife area. Early versions of the map have focused on specific areas, such as 7 neighborhoods in Olinda/PE (Rio Doce, Casa Caiada, Jardim Atlântico, Bairro Novo, Carmo, Ouro Preto, and Peixinhos).
Compatibility with Dbus World: This map is specifically mentioned as being compatible with Dbus World, an application that enhances the bus simulation experience in ETS2 by adding features like passenger management, ticket sales, and more immersive bus operations. This makes the “Projeto Grande Recife” ideal for a truly realistic urban bus driver simulation.
Ongoing Development: Like many ambitious map mods, “Projeto Grande Recife” is a work in progress. Modders continue to develop and expand the map, adding more areas and details over time.
Simple Design (Early Stages): Some descriptions indicate that the map is developed with a “simple” approach, often utilizing original game objects but arranged to accurately represent the environment. This helps in terms of performance and accessibility.
Traffic and Environment: It aims to provide realistic traffic conditions and environmental details appropriate for an urban Brazilian setting.

Installation Steps (General for ETS2 Mods):
1. Download: Download the mod file(s). These are usually in .scs format. If it’s a multi-part mod, make sure to download all necessary files.
2. Locate Mod Folder: Go to your ETS2 mod folder, which is typically found at: `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
3. Copy Files: Copy the downloaded `.scs` file(s) into this `mod` folder.
4. Activate in Game:
Start Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the main menu, go to the Mod Manager.
Find “Projeto Grande Recife” in the list of available mods.
Activate it by moving it from the left column to the right column.
Set Mod Priority: If the mod has multiple parts or if you’re using other map mods, pay close attention to the loading order (priority). The modder usually provides instructions for this. Maps usually require a higher priority than other general mods.
Confirm your changes and load your game profile. You might need to create a new profile specifically for this map to avoid conflicts with other map mods, especially if it’s a standalone map.

Credits: PAULINHO GOGO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes Benz New Actros 2019 v2.0 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 12, 2025

Mercedes Benz New Actros 2019 v2.0 1.55 ETS2

Version 2.0 for 1.55
– change to ETS2 – 1.55

Features:
– 5 cabins: StreamSpace 2,50, BigSpace , GigaSpace, Edition1, Edition 2
– Actros L Addon with own interiors, badges, headlights and Edition 3. Actuilly without new cams!
– 15 chassis variants: 11 chassis tractor
– 7 engine variants OM 471 / OM 471 – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 gearbox variants – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 Interior variants LHD + RHD: Basic, Style Line, Trend Line, Edition 1, Edition 2
– 40 original Mercedes colors + Safety Truck skin, Edition 1 skin, Edition 2 CharterWay skin + SCS Paintjobs ready
– SCS Mercedes Actros DLC Ready

Credits: Wolli2017

item.title: Ural Map v1.6 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 12, 2025

Ural Map v1.6 ETS2

Update: v1.6
– Moved the map to make road connecting more possible
– Verkhoturye rework, add Privokzalnyi

Description:
Warehouses of enterprises and cities of the Sverdlovsk and Khanty-Mansiysk Autonomous Okrug will be added to the map.
The mod can be played both separately and as an add-on. mod connected by train with SibirMap and Calais.

Compatible with 1.55

Credits: szev1993ave
